mapper.select: select * from project where sid=#{sid} and (prank=#{prank} or prank=#{officemark}) and isissue = 1 and tostatus = 3 and (ischange = 0 and isremove = 0)
select * from project where sid=#{sid} and isissue = 1 and tostatus = 3

SELECT project.*, student.*, teacher.* FROM project, student, teacher WHERE student.`academy` = #{academyname} AND project.`isteam` = 0 AND (tostatus = 2 or tostatus = -2 or tostatus = 3 or tostatus = -3)
Group by pid

SELECT project.*, student.*, teacher.* FROM project, student, teacher WHERE student.`academy` = #{academyname} AND project.`isteam` = 0 AND (changestatus = 2 or changestatus = -2 or changestatus = 3 or changestatus = -3)
Group by pid

SELECT project.*, student.*, teacher.* FROM project, student, teacher WHERE student.`academy` = #{academyname} AND project.`isteam` = 0 AND (removestatus = 2 or removestatus = -2 or removestatus = 3 or removestatus = -3)
Group by pid
